entries.text: The Bulletin is a monthly publication by the Central Bank of Montenegro, giving an overview of the main statistical data on monetary developments.

entries.title: Monetary Policy - CBCG
entries.text: The CBCG pursues monetary policy in a specific foreign exchange regime. The existing foreign exchange regime in Montenegro is dollarisation (euroisation).
